definition: old friend/sb who passed the county level imperial exam (in Ming dynasty)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: In an atmosphere of joy, new and old friends celebrated the Chinese traditional festival together.
sentences.chinese: 在歡樂的氣氛中，新朋老友一起歡度中國的傳統佳節。

sentences.english: Old friends and old wine are best.
The bank of the Ganges welcomed me into its lap like a friend of a former birth.
sentences.chinese: 恆河河岸就像我前生前世的老友一樣擁我入懷。

sentences.english: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
sentences.chinese: 老友的好處之一就是你可與之耍瘋扮癡。

sentences.english: "What attracted me most aboutFriends was the friendship between the roommates," Wang says.
sentences.chinese: “《老友記》吸引我的是室友間的友誼，”王說。”

sentences.english: Hello, darkness, my old friend, I've come to talk with you again.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜你好，我的老友，我又來和你傾訴衷腸。

sentences.english: Sure, they’re b.f.f.s, but we always thought
sentences.chinese: 當然，她倆是鐵桿老友，但大家都認爲。

sentences.english: Six senior high school friend in a luxury vessel held a weekend party.
sentences.chinese: 六個高中時代的老友在一艘豪華遊艇上舉行週末聚會。

sentences.english: After having lunch, I learned the twenty-third episode of Friends.
sentences.chinese: 喫過午飯之後，我學習了《老友記》第二十三集。

sentences.english: I watched the twenty-second episode of Friends this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我觀看了《老友記》第二十二集。

sentences.english: This is one reason why Friends is more interesting than your friends.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼《老友記》比老友更有趣的原因之一。

sentences.english: This is one reason why Friends is more interesting than your friends.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼《老友記》比老友更有趣的原因之一。

sentences.english: One day Sisco got a call from his old friend DJ Gizmo .
sentences.chinese: 某天西斯可接到老友DJ吉默打來的電話。

sentences.english: Hang out with your long-time friends more and contact those with whom you have lost touch.
sentences.chinese: 多多與多年老友碰面，重新找到失去聯繫的朋友。

sentences.english: Laoyou rice noodles are our local snack.
sentences.chinese: 老友粉是我們這的小喫。

definition: close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)
friends despite the difference in age
to reminisce/to talk about former times
to meet again after a long period of separation
